resources.string:
It is very easy to schedule a false call for special situations. You just have to 

1. Set the timer 
2. Choose any call option 
3. Press on Ereptum! 

Then your call will be scheduled.

To schedule a call, you should follow several steps: 

1. Set the timer 
2. Choose any call option 
3. Press on Ereptum! 

Once the timer get expired, you will receive a false call. This call will not cost you any money. 

You can find more information at 
http://www.ereptum.com

Ereptum is an application which allow you to schedule a false call based on a Timer in order to escape from uncomfortable situations in elegant way. 

It is the first application published at Android market by Jiahao Liu, who is software engineer graduated at the Polytechnic university of Madrid, Spain. 

He also has been awarded by the Royal institute of Technologies (KTH), Sweden for a master degree on Distributed System. 

For more information about him, you can visit at: 
http://www.jiahaoliuliu.com/p/about-me.html
Press home or back to exit
